pr_title: Support for generic Key and Trust material

timeline.message:
Added option to create key and trust material from KeyManager, KeyManagerFactory, TrustManager, TrustManagerFactory

Signed-off-by: Hakan Altindag <hakangoudberg@hotmail.com>

Used different constructor for backwards compatibility

Signed-off-by: Hakan Altindag <hakangoudberg@hotmail.com>

Renamed key and trust materials

Signed-off-by: Hakan Altindag <hakangoudberg@hotmail.com>

Extracted options for KeyManager, KeyManagerFactory, TrustManager, TrustManagerFactory

Signed-off-by: Hakan Altindag <hakangoudberg@hotmail.com>

Applied PR feedback

Signed-off-by: Hakan Altindag <hakangoudberg@hotmail.com>

Corrected methods to be able to access in a static context

Signed-off-by: Hakan Altindag <hakangoudberg@hotmail.com>

replies.bodyText: It is not necessary, I wanted to create new KeyOptions based on their input values and therefor I created two implementations, 1. KeyManagerOptions and 2. KeyManagerFactoryOptions as one can be build from the keymanagerfactory and the other one from just only a keymanager. But if you prefer to have a single implementation I can move the constructor to KeyManagerFactoryOptions
replies.author: Hakky54
